title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7017.2 - Briefing of new employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7017.2 - Briefing of new employees

State Regulations
A manual of facility policies and procedures shall be
made available to each facility employee at the time of appointment. The chief
administrative officer shall insure that each correction officer, prior to
assignment to active duty, is instructed with respect to the responsibilities
and requirements of their position. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7017.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
